title: 5 Steps to 5 Stars
tagline: A practical framework for consistent, high-performance service.
subtitle: A structured, restaurant-first training series inspired by top-tier service environments and built for real-world execution.

format.contentStyle: short sections, structured blocks, operational language

goals: Create consistent service behaviors under pressure
Improve guest confidence through structure and polish
Build team coordination and predictable execution

thesis.headline: Standards are not restrictions. They are performance amplifiers.
thesis.supportingText: This course teaches service as a system. When expectations are clear and execution is reinforced, teams move with confidence and guests feel the difference.

modules.title: The Architecture of Excellence
modules.subtitle: Why Structured Standards Create 5-Star Performance
modules.summary: Learn why elite restaurants rely on structured standards to create consistent, repeatable guest excellence.
keyOutcomes: Understand how standards reduce variance during busy service
Recognize excellence as trainable behavior, not personality
Adopt the mindset that structure amplifies performance

modules.title: Precision in Preparation
modules.subtitle: Reservation, Pre-Arrival, and Control Systems
modules.summary: Build operational control before service begins using reservation discipline, alignment, and pre-shift systems.
keyOutcomes: Use reservations as a pacing and control tool
Run pre-shift alignment that prevents confusion later

modules.title: Mastering the First Impression
modules.subtitle: Arrival Protocol and Guest Positioning
modules.summary: Control the first three minutes through acknowledgment, movement, and seamless transitions that build immediate trust.
keyOutcomes: Acknowledge every guest immediately, even during peak flow
Use pace, posture, and environment to communicate control
Create smooth handoffs that feel unified and intentional

modules.title: Execution Under Pressure
modules.subtitle: Dining Room Performance and Service Control
modules.summary: Deliver precise timing, communication, and composure when the dining room is full and expectations are highest.
keyOutcomes: Follow pacing standards instead of relying on instinct
Use calm, structured communication to prevent chaos
Maintain composed body language that sets the tone

modules.title: Legacy and Recovery
modules.subtitle: Departure, Guest Retention, and Reputation Control
modules.summary: Close strong, recover confidently, and build retention systems that protect reputation and deepen loyalty.
keyOutcomes: Handle recovery with ownership and corrective action
Use follow-through to build repeat business and trust

recommendedFlow: Read modules in order for best results
Apply one behavior shift per shift for one week
Use the AI Training Assistant to rehearse scenarios
Reinforce learning with the quiz after completing the course

seo.metaDescription: A structured, practical training course that turns service standards into consistent 5-star execution. Built for restaurant teams and operators.
